text: How It Feels to Be Run Over is a 1900 British silent movie directed by Cecil M. HepworthDeborah Cartmell. A Companion to Literature, Film, and AdaptationHow It Feels to Be Run Over and stars Cecil Hepworth and May Clark. ==Actors== * Cecil Hepworth as Driver * May Clark as Passenger * Several actors as passengers ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:British movies Category:1900 movies Category:British silent movies
title: How It Feels to Be Run Over
